name: Learn Italian: alphabet, letters, rules & sounds
description: LEARN ITALIAN: alphabet , letters, all the reading rules and exceptions as no other app has taught you before. Its FREE and can be used offline, for real. Discover the first Italian Alphabet that teaches you how to read correctly any word.   READ & WRITE confidently with FunEasyLearn. Get instant access to all the spelling rules and exceptions. Practice 4000 useful words to understand easily the Italian pronunciation.   SPEAK ITALIAN  quickly & effortlessly. Improve your accent and pronunciation using the speech recognition feature and make letters & words stick better.   LISTEN  to high-quality recordings made by native speakers. Get used to natural Italian speech right from the start.   PLAY  many interactive games that will help you learn reading: Choose Letter, Vowels & Consonants, Capital & Small Letters, Write First Letter, Choose Word, Listen & Find Word, Write Word, Find Exceptions, etc.  ===========================  CONTENTS   170 spelling rules & 4000 Words for practice  54 native languages to choose from  UPPERCASE & lowercase letters  Vowels & Consonants   Advanced Statistics    ===========================  What makes this app unique?  Beside letters, FunEasyLearn Alphabet (ABC) provides the top most common words linked to all the reading rules. Each rule comes with a detailed explanation and a step-by-step tutorial of how to find it in a word. In this way, you will never forget what youve learned.   Learning Italian means knowing the exceptions as well as the rules. Thats why, we carefully selected the most frequent exceptions, so you could easily find them in texts, blogs, or newspapers. Now it makes sense why FunEasyLearn Alphabet is a great tool that teaches you reading.   Useful apps are more than unique, they solve problems.   ===========================  FEATURES    NEW: the first Italian Alphabet that really teaches you how to read any word;  FUN: play 7 games, such as Listen & Choose or Listen & Complete Letters, feel good, earn flowers & bees;  EASY: learn Italian at your own pace, set your learning speed & keep your longest streak unbeaten;  FREE: play and unlock letters one-by-one for free;  USEFUL: track your progress, see how many rules youve learned & the time spent in the app;  PROFESSIONAL voice-actors: letters, rules, exceptions, words, all have a real-human pronunciation;  GREAT: never forget any letter or any pronunciation rule, review anything anytime;  OFFLINE: learn anytime & anywhere for real. No internet connection is required.  ===========================  Take your first step to learn Italian & prepare yourself for more language learning goals, as building word vocabulary and making up phrases with the Learn All Languages app.   DOWNLOAD the app NOW!   ===========================  FunEasyLearn (FEL) is a team consisting of qualified developers, designers, linguists and teachers exploring all the perspectives to learn a language for free the easy and the fun way.   First new FunEasyLearn Alphabet is as a little baby bee that needs care! Review & rate us! Leave a feedback or a comment! It means a lot to us!
